languages.text: {n}Соломон клятвенно поднимает сжатый кулак и качает головой.{/n} "Нет. Я не выведываю чужих тайн и не осуществляю тайного наблюдения. Лишь записываю то, что вижу. Хранить бдительность — мой долг".

traits.locale_text: долг обязывает. Не шпионю, просто наблюдаю"

languages.text: {n}Solomorne shakes his head and raises a clenched fist as if swearing to tell the truth.{/n} "No. I don't ferret out other people's secrets or conduct covert surveillance. I only record what I see. It is my duty to remain vigilant."
languages.original_text: {n}Соломон клятвенно поднимает сжатый кулак и качает головой.{/n} "Нет. Я не выведываю чужих тайн и не осуществляю тайного наблюдения. Лишь записываю то, что вижу. Хранить бдительность — мой долг".

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンは首を振り、真実を誓うかのように、固く握りしめた拳を掲げた。{/n}「いいえ。他人の秘密を嗅ぎまわったり、密かに監視したりはしません。私はただ、自分の目で見たことを記録するだけです。警戒を怠らないことが、私の義務ですから」
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne shakes his head and raises a clenched fist as if swearing to tell the truth.{/n} "No. I don't ferret out other people's secrets or conduct covert surveillance. I only record what I see. It is my duty to remain vigilant."

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンは首を振り、真実を誓うかのように、固く握りしめた拳を掲げた。{/n}「いいえ。他人の秘密を嗅ぎまわったり、密かに監視したりはしません。私はただ、自分の目で見たことを記録するだけです。警戒を怠らないことが、私の義務ですから」

languages.text: {n}Solomorne schüttelt den Kopf und hebt eine geballte Faust, als wolle er schwören, die Wahrheit zu sagen.{/n} "Nein. Ich lüfte nicht anderer Leute Geheimnisse oder führe insgeheim Beobachtungen durch. Ich nehme lediglich auf, was ich sehe. Es ist meine Pflicht, wachsam zu bleiben."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne shakes his head and raises a clenched fist as if swearing to tell the truth.{/n} "No. I don't ferret out other people's secrets or conduct covert surveillance. I only record what I see. It is my duty to remain vigilant."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne schüttelt den Kopf und hebt eine geballte Faust, als wolle er schwören, die Wahrheit zu sagen.{/n} "Nein. Ich lüfte nicht anderer Leute Geheimnisse oder führe insgeheim Beobachtungen durch. Ich nehme lediglich auf, was ich sehe. Es ist meine Pflicht, wachsam zu bleiben."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne secoue la tête et brandit un poing serré comme pour jurer de dire la vérité.{/n} « Non. Je ne fourre pas mon nez dans les affaires des autres ni ne surveille secrètement qui que ce soit. Je ne fais que consigner mes observations par écrit. Mon devoir exige la plus grande vigilance. »
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne shakes his head and raises a clenched fist as if swearing to tell the truth.{/n} "No. I don't ferret out other people's secrets or conduct covert surveillance. I only record what I see. It is my duty to remain vigilant."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne secoue la tête et brandit un poing serré comme pour jurer de dire la vérité.{/n} « Non. Je ne fourre pas mon nez dans les affaires des autres ni ne surveille secrètement qui que ce soit. Je ne fais que consigner mes observations par écrit. Mon devoir exige la plus grande vigilance. »

languages.text: {n}Solomorne menea la cabeza y levanta el puño como si jurase decir la verdad.{/n} «No. Nunca indagaría en secretos ajenos ni llevaría a cabo una vigilancia encubierta. Tan solo anoto lo que veo. Es mi deber permanecer siempre alerta».
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne shakes his head and raises a clenched fist as if swearing to tell the truth.{/n} "No. I don't ferret out other people's secrets or conduct covert surveillance. I only record what I see. It is my duty to remain vigilant."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne menea la cabeza y levanta el puño como si jurase decir la verdad.{/n} «No. Nunca indagaría en secretos ajenos ni llevaría a cabo una vigilancia encubierta. Tan solo anoto lo que veo. Es mi deber permanecer siempre alerta».

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙摇着头，举起了紧握的拳头，仿佛在发誓自己说的都是实话一样。{/n}“没有，我从不会窥探别人的秘密，也从不会进行秘密监视。我仅仅是写下我看到的一切，保持警惕是我的职责。”
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne shakes his head and raises a clenched fist as if swearing to tell the truth.{/n} "No. I don't ferret out other people's secrets or conduct covert surveillance. I only record what I see. It is my duty to remain vigilant."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙摇着头，举起了紧握的拳头，仿佛在发誓自己说的都是实话一样。{/n}“没有，我从不会窥探别人的秘密，也从不会进行秘密监视。我仅仅是写下我看到的一切，保持警惕是我的职责。”

languages.text: {n}Solomorne, sağ elini yumruk yapıp yemin eder gibi kaldırıyor.{/n} "Haşa! Başkalarının sırlarını kurcalamam, casusluk da yapmıyorum. Yalnızca gördüğümü kayda geçiriyorum. Müteyakkız kalmak vazifemdir."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne shakes his head and raises a clenched fist as if swearing to tell the truth.{/n} "No. I don't ferret out other people's secrets or conduct covert surveillance. I only record what I see. It is my duty to remain vigilant."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne sağ elini yumruk yapıp yemin eder gibi kaldırdı.{/n} "Haşa! Başkalarının sırlarını kurcalamam, casusluk da yapmıyorum. Yalnızca gördüğümü kayda geçiririm. Müteyakkız kalmak vazifemdir."

languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne shakes his head and raises a clenched fist as if swearing to tell the truth.{/n} "No. I don't ferret out other people's secrets or conduct covert surveillance. I only record what I see. It is my duty to remain vigilant."
